title: What is the eligibility for OC students for Telangana engineering fee reimbursement? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should have a proof for your income being low- a ration card or income certificate with income being less than 2.5 lakhs. And if your rank is below 10k you will get full fee reimbursement, if you have income proof. If above 10k, you will get a max. Fee reimbursement of 35k.
